tagline: A React Web App for Creating and Sharing Drum Loops.
desc: A React Web App for Creating and Sharing Drum Loops.

__**Features:**__ 
• Create Drum Loops 
• Record Custom Sounds 
• Save and Share Drum Loops With Others

__**Front End Tech:**__ 
• [React](https://reactjs.org/) - JavaScript UI Library 
• [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/) - Server Side Rendering
• [Styled Components](https://www.styled-components.com/) - Styling
• [Jest](https://jestjs.io/) - JavaScript Testing Framework
• [Puppeteer](https://developers.google.com/web/tools/puppeteer) - A Node Library for Controlling Headless Chrome or Chromium. Used for end to end Testing
• [Storybook](https://storybook.js.org/) - Tool for Developing UI Components in Isolation

__**Back End Tech:**__ 
• [Express](https://expressjs.com/) - Web Framework for Node.js
• [PostgreSql](https://www.postgresql.org/) - Relational Database
• [Redis](https://redis.io/) - In-Memory Data Structure Store used for Authorization

tasks.title: Trello Tasks
tasks.desc: We use Trello to manage the tasks within this project, [here](https://trello.com/drumroot) is your invitation. Further information on how to use Trello and claim a task can be found in the [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/zero-to-mastery/drum-root/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) file on Github.
